channel.title: Bypassing a program that disables scar
channel.description:
When i try and use scar on other games it doesn't work becuase of that F***KN program hackshiled.I was wondering if anyone here knows how to disable it or bypass it.I'd really appreciate it if anyone could
thx
and nice forums :D

item.title: Bypassing a program that disables scar
item.dc:creator: @d3ltr33 d3ltr33
item.description:
@d3ltr33 wrote:

Try AutoIt. It uses visual basic code (i think... can't remember) and it has the added feature of being able to compile your scripts into stand alone executables. It includes heaps of examples and sample scripts so it's easy to learn.

Read full topic
item.source: Bypassing a program that disables scar

item.title: Bypassing a program that disables scar

item.description:

daiki:

I used scar to bet money on horse races in San Andreas, worked fine.

I couldn't get it working in the gym.

item.title: Bypassing a program that disables scar
item.dc:creator: @traitors traitors
item.description:
@traitors wrote:

I have heard of AC tools but I am much more familar with scar.I am going to use it on 2 games i know at the moment

http://www.knight-online.com.my/client.asp
http://www.kalonline.com/

iv tried noob things like deleting the hackshield file lol.but i get a file missing error.I spose one of you guys knows how to trick it in2 thinking hackshield is their or somethink.
thanks on the intrest so far i'v been trying to crack this for ages glad to see some people finally helping out

cheers

Read full topic

item.description:
@Nerice wrote:

Try AC Tools, similar to scar, better in some respects (can access, read, and change memory), worse in other ways.

http://forums.cameroncole.com/index.php?

@Krichevskoy wrote:

Anything that is protected by a commerical wrapper like that must first exist without it. It can probably be removed or circumvented in some way.

What game, specifically?

As for your question traitors, I'm really not quite sure how hackshield works, so I don't know.

EDIT: Hmmm, for the other games does it force you to D\L a client? If so, you could probably disable it through a cracking method.
